schema.description: Tag key group, up to 20 items

items.description: List of tag keys, n ranges from 1 to 20.

schema.title: 是否全部删除，只针对TagKey.N为空时有效。 取值范围： true  false True False  默认是 false
schema.description: Whether to delete all, only effective when TagKey.N is empty. Allowed values: true, false, True, False. Default is false.
The list of tags to be queried. The value range for N is 1~20.

items.description:
Tags of the resource.

Supports up to 20 tags at most.

Key.description: Tag key, with n in the range [1, 20].

schema.description: Next token for the next query

items.description: The maximum length of the array is 20.
